title: FoodHub Data Analysis
description: Performed exploratory data analysis for a food delivery company to understand customer demand across restaurants and cuisines. Generated actionable insights to improve customer experience and support business decisions.

title: Keylogger
description: A tool for educational purposes that logs keystrokes and takes screenshots. This tool demonstrates both software-based and hardware-based keylogging techniques.

title: Network Scanner
description: A command-line tool designed for network administrators and security professionals to scan and analyze network hosts using techniques like ICMP echo requests, TCP port scanning, and ARP scanning.

title: VulnScan
description: A lightweight Python vulnerability scanner that scans target IPs/URLs for open ports, HTTP security headers, SSL/TLS certificate info, and known CVEs through banner-based lookup.

title: SecurePass - Password Health & Breach Monitoring App
description: A full-stack app that checks password strength and known data breaches using HaveIBeenPwned API and zxcvbn.

title: File I/O Utility Library (Custom Insert, Delete, Extract)
description: Developed a low-level file manipulation library in C using system calls to insert, delete, and extract bytes from files at arbitrary positionsâ€”without relying on stdio. Designed for systems programming coursework.
